text: Takalani Ndlovu (born 11 January 1978), is a South African professional boxer with orthodox stance who goes by the nickname of "Panther". His professional record includes 38 fights: 32 wins (18 knockouts), and 6 losses. He lives in Johannesburg, Gauteng, South Africa. ==Pro career== He won the IBF junior featherweight title against Canadian Steve Molitor on 26 March 2011. ==Professional boxing record==
